description: Sum of digits of n-th prime.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
CNRS press release, Sum of Digits of Prime Numbers Is Evenly Distributed: New Mathematical Proof of Hypothesis

Christian Mauduit, Joël Rivat, Sur un problème de Gelfond: la somme des chiffres des nombres premiers (French) [On a problem posed by Gelfond: the sum of digits of primes] Ann. of Math. (2) 171(2010), no. 3, 1591--1646. MR2680394 (2011j:11137)
maple: map(t -> convert(convert(t,base,10),`+`), select(isprime, [2,(2*i+1 $ i=1..1000)])); # _Robert Israel_, Aug 16 2015
prog: (MAGMA) [ &+Intseq(NthPrime(n), 10): n in [1..80] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jun 13 2009](PARI) dsum(n)=my(s);while(n,s+=n%10;n\=10);sforprime(p=2,1e3,print1(dsum(p)", ")) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 15 2011(Haskell)a007605_list = map a007953 a000040_list -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 04 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
